name: @vtmn/css-design-tokens
description: Decathlon Design System - Vitamin specific CSS styles for design tokens

scripts.build: yarn build:css && yarn build:scss && yarn build:less
scripts.build:css: postcss src/index.css -o dist/index.css && cross-env FONT_SIZE_BASE=10 postcss src/index.css -o dist/index-base10.css
scripts.build:less: cross-env LESS_FORMAT=true postcss dist/index.css -o dist/index.less && cross-env LESS_FORMAT=true postcss dist/index-base10.css -o dist/index-base10.less
scripts.build:scss: cross-env SCSS_FORMAT=true postcss dist/index.css -o dist/index.scss && cross-env SCSS_FORMAT=true postcss dist/index-base10.css -o dist/index-base10.scss
